Docs.typeparam: The type of items in the input instance.
Docs.summary: Gets a content hash from the input instance using the Djb2 algorithm. For more info, see the documentation for .
Docs.returns: The Djb2 value for the input instance.
Docs.remarks: The Djb2 hash is fully deterministic and with no random components.
